synopsis.value:
Na A Jeong, a struggling actress stuck playing extras, agrees to pose as her longtime friend Lee Do Han’s wife to appease his chaebol family. While preparing for her "role," Do Han's younger brother Ji Han, determined to secure his brother as the LJ Group's heir, throws a wrench in their plan. Ji Han introduces Yun Chae Won as Do Han's potential bride, sparking unexpected chaos. As secrets, ambitions, and fake relationships

collide, A Jeong finds herself at the center of a dramatic and unpredictable family saga.

(Source: MyDramaList)

~~ Adapted from the webtoon "Wedding Impossible" (웨딩 임파서블) written by Song Jung Won (송정원) and illustrated by Lee Chung (이청).

value: ป่วนวิวาห์สัญญารักกำมะลอ
